services.heading: Services
services.text2: The specific tools used for back-end development depend on the requirements of a project, the programming language being used, and the developer's preferences and experience. The back-end developer's role is to build and maintain the server-side of the application and ensure that it can effectively handle the required data and communication between the front-end and the database.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
